method.name: set
method.digest: Choose a named buffer~ from which to read
method.description: Choose a named buffer~ from which to read.

method.name: backup
method.digest: Backup the current buffer content
method.description: Backup the current buffer content

method.name: autoconv
method.digest: EXPERIMENTAL Convolve the buffer with itself

method.description: Apply a bandpass filter: bandpass freq q

method.name: bits
method.digest: Apply a bitcrusher effect: bits [bit depth] wet
method.description: Apply a bitcrusher effect: bits [bit depth] wet

method.name: notch
method.digest: Apply a notch filter: notch freq q
method.description: Apply a notch filter: notch freq q

method.name: allpass
method.digest: Apply an allpass filter: allpass freq q
method.description: Apply an allpass filter: allpass freq q

method.name: lowshelf
method.digest: Apply a low shelving filter: lowshelf freq gain
method.description: Apply a low shelving filter: lowshelf freq gain

method.name: hishelf
method.digest: Apply a high shelving filter: hishelf freq gain
method.description: Apply a high shelving filter: hishelf freq gain

method.description: Ring modulate the buffer with another buffer: rm [buffer name]

method.description: Amplitude modulate the buffer with a simple wave: am freq waveform

method.name: ambuf
method.digest: Amplitude modulate the buffer with another buffer: am [buffer name]
method.description: Amplitude modulate the buffer with another buffer: am [buffer name]

method.name: sort
method.digest: Sort samples in order: sort [a(scending) / d(escending)]
method.description: Sort samples in order: sort [a(scending) / d(escending)]

method.description: Fill the buffer with noise, optionaly mixing it with current content: noise mix

method.description: Apply a delay: delay [time in milliseconds] feedback

method.name: fade
method.digest: Fade in or out: fade [in / out] time [ms / %]
method.description: Fade in or out: fade [in / out] time [ms / %]

method.name: length
method.digest: Change buffer length (changes pitch, too): length amount [ms / % / samps]
method.description: Change buffer length (changes pitch, too): length amount [ms / % / samps]

method.name: mix
method.digest: Mix with other buffers: mix [buffer name] [buffer gain] ..
